div.p: The regular meeting for the Norwood Board of Education scheduled for April 20, 2020 at 6:00PM has been canceled. Our next scheduled regular meeting is May 18, 2020 at 6:00PM. Please email Superintendent Black at dblack@norwood63.org if you have a question.

We have created a district website dedicated to Remote Learning. The website link below will take all of our students, staff, and families to our "central hub" for Remote Learning. Once there, you will be able to navigate between District, NES, and NPS information and materials. We hope this source of information will be easy to navigate for all our families while we begin this journey together. There will be many successes, and . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Remote Learning "Central Hub"
Read more about Remote Learning Plan

div.p: Our SEAPCO counselor for our district is Mrs. Sparrow. She sees several students on a weekly basis at the primary and elementary. Please feel free to contact her if you’d like. Her email address is esparrow@seapco.org. During this time it is very important to take care of ourselves mentally and physically.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:54 pm CDT

td.span: Mostly clear, with a low around 37. North northeast wind 3 to 5 mph.

A 20 percent chance of showers after 4pm. Areas of frost before 9am. Otherwise, mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Light west northwest wind becoming west 9 to 14 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 38. West southwest wind 11 to 15 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph.

div.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
